Literature.Title: D- and Unnatural Amino Acid Substituted Antimicrobial Peptides With Improved Proteolytic Resistance and Their Proteolytic Degradation Characteristics.
Literature.Author: Lu J, Xu H, Xia J, Ma J, Xu J, Li Y, Feng J

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:6.13±0.41% Hemolysis=32 µM,Human erythrocytes:18.23±2.76% Hemolysis=64 µM,Human erythrocytes:30.1±2.61% Hemolysis=128 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=1µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=1µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=4µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=2µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=2µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=1µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=4µg/ml),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(IC50=17.54±2.99µM)
